title: Suggestion to balance Cinderhulk
body:
Just delete it. Seriously. This item is like AIDS and Cancer had a baby then that baby got induced with Ebola. 

Bring back juggernaut = no more tank meta, easy

Why should a FULL TANK gragas do more damage than an ADC?

replies.body:
Cinderhulk is fine, a few outliers being able to abuse it doesn't mean the enchantment is overpowered.

(Also Gragas doesn't even scale off the health like Sejuani so i'm missing the reason your bitching, because full tank Gragas will still do the same damage)

Gragas doesn't scale off the health?

Heals 4% of max HP every spell cast.

Being able to heal now scales your damage.

You heard it here first folks.

Scale means - "increased based off x".

IE his healing increases based off health.

There is damage scaling and defense scaling; you just said scaling.

As in gragas gains no increase to the scaling effect of his abilities by building health, when he does.

You mean he doesn't gain damage from building health. Gaining an increase to his healing effect from building health - is scaling, off health.

Weren't you the one bitching that gragas' does more damage then the ADC?

Because correct me if i'm wrong, this just scales his tankiness, not his damage output.

If Gragas was popular due to his Passive, then Mundo would be just as popular.

>(Also Gragas doesn't even scale off the health like Sejuani so i'm missing the reason your bitching, because full tank Gragas will still do the same damage)

This is what i said in the first place, Note how i'm implying that his damage doesn't scale?

Fact is, Gragas doesn't scale off the health LIKE sejuani, because he just heals up off it.
How does Gragas scaling somewhat better with health outdamage an ADC?

1. All of Graggy's damage is up-front burst then he has to wait 5 seconds to do it again.
2. You're just a butt-hurt early agro jungle bruiser main who's sad because jarvan isnt OP anymore.
3. cry more.

>Why should a FULL TANK gragas do more damage than an ADC?

most full take BRUISER can duel adc's lel
thats how bruiser roll

i remember full tank garen 1v1 their adc.
you want garen nerfed too? 

they already destroyed cinders damage
if you cant beat em, play them. or lrn2kite, or ward, or play safer. this is the definition of meta

"Why should a FULL TANK gragas do more damage than an ADC?"

Yes, I'm sure the 100 magic damage per second is more damage than an adc.

Rito has already nerfed it multiple times not to mention it and the champions who work really well with at are still receiving nerfs soon. BORK is getting buffed, Sej is getting nerfed, Gragas is getting nerfed (or did he already in that last patch? I can't remember), Rek'Sai is getting nerfed. Plus there are so many great champions now that are meta, popular and great tank killers. Viktor just isn't really one of them...

And Gragas does do a fair bit of damage when he builds full tank, but he doesn't get anywhere near as tanky as other popular meta tanks. And... does no where near as much damage as an ADC.... but that goes without saying.

Juggernaut left tanks out of the viability circle that's why it was shatted on and eventually removed, because it focused too much on mid-late game while most tanks had trouble finishing their first clear alive.

Certain individuals scale too well with the item doesn't mean everyone else in the same class should enjoy the rubbish bin slot.

Not to mention Riot is already nerfing Cinderhulk and buffing BotRK, not much else to complain already really.
